As the two chatted, BLACKARACHNIA crawled a=
head.  The bonus of having so many together would mean they were distracted=
 by one naother's presence, and not paying attention to her own. Ironically=
, the immediate arrival of the others would be her best asset of avoiding t=
he patrols then as they were chatty and expressing their suspicions to one =
another.

With luck, as she went to crawl along the ceiling, by the time th=
ey had finished thier discussion she would be long gone.
